name: Despair machine
description:
This game is a prototype : it will be made of choices and rhythm-based fights.  

During fights, don't die before the music is over. Every choice will lead to unique endings and unique fights.

For now, you don't really have a choice and can only do one fight.

You can play in english or french.

You can change controls in options.

Base controls : 

-Move with WASD

-Jump with space bar

-Actions with enter

Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/entapsia

Discord : https://discord.gg/eTenyhz
